short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to analyze URLs using the Social Toad API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Social Toad allows you while viewing a website to quickly log the website url to a log within your account easily by Clicking on the extension and clicking Analyze.  This adds the website url you are currently viewing to your dashboard in your account.
